mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.custom_name AS "customName", a.custom_code AS "customCode"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM archive_custom a
AND a.custom_code LIKE '%'||#{customCode}||'%' '%'+#{customCode}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{customCode}, '%')
AND a.custom_name LIKE '%'||#{customName}||'%' '%'+#{customName}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{customName}, '%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
